welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ottweiler, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere this city is known for and immerse yourself in its rich history and culture. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Ottweiler has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ensheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ensheim Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Zweibrücken Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ramstein Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
